description: Your closet isn't complete without these Thermal Merino Joggers. These ultra-comfortable Merino joggers are made with 100% Merino wool fabric and feature an elastic leg opening for a secure, adjustable fit. Plus, a Merino-covered elastic interior waistband and pockets for convenience and warmth. Whether you're relaxing around the fire or getting into your favorite winter activities, these joggers pack a punch.
name: Smartwool Thermal Merino 250 Joggers - Mens
